contentList.content: Ability Improvement
Select two <LSTag Tooltip="Abilities">Abilities</LSTag>. These abilities increase by an amount equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Strength Improvement
Increase your Strength by an amount equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Dexterity Improvement
Increase your Dexterity by an amount equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Constitution Improvement
Increase your Constitution by an amount equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Intelligence Improvement
Increase your Intelligence by an amount equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Wisdom Improvement
Increase your Wisdom by an amount equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Charisma Improvement
Increase your Charisma by an amount equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Accord of the Arcane

Learn two <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrips</LSTag> of your choice. Additionally, Cantrips which cost an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> may be cast as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> instead. This may be toggled at any time.
Accord of the Arcane
Cantrips which cost an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> may be cast as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> instead. This may be toggled at any time.
Alert

Gain a +8 bonus to Initiative and you cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>. Upon starting combat, and upon starting your turn while <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FLANKED">Threatened</LSTag>, you immediately <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage">Disengage</LSTag>.
Athleticism

Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump</LSTag> distance is doubled and no longer requires <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>. In addition, you gain an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
Charger

Gain the ability to charge toward nearby enemies as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> once per turn, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_Charger_Attack>Attacking</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_Charger_Push">Shoving</LSTag> them in the process.
Charger: Attack
Charge into nearby enemies, making an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against the first you come in contact with.
Charger: Shove
Charge into nearby enemies, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Shove">Shoving</LSTag> the first you come in contact with.
Class Specialist: Artificer
Select two passives from the Artificer passives list.
Class Specialist: Barbarian
Select two passives from the Barbarian passives list.
Class Specialist: Bard
Select two passives from the Bard passives list.
Class Specialist: Cleric
Select two passives from the Cleric passives list.
Class Specialist: Druid
Select two passives from the Druid passives list.
Class Specialist: Fighter
Select two passives from the Fighter passives list.
Class Specialist: Monk
Select two passives from the Monk passives list.
Class Specialist: Paladin
Select two passives from the Paladin passives list.
Class Specialist: Ranger
Select two passives from the Ranger passives list.
Class Specialist: Rogue
Select two passives from the Rogue passives list.
Class Specialist: Sorcerer
Select two passives from the Sorcerer passives list.
Class Specialist: Warlock
Select two passives from the Warlock passives list.
Class Specialist: Wizard
Select two passives from the Wizard passives list.
Composed

Upon being damaged by an enemy, you may expend your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to restore +1d12 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> multiplied by your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to yourself and all nearby allies. Additionally, when making a successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an enemy, you may expend your Reaction to heal allies near your target, including yourself.
Regain Composure

Upon being damaged by an enemy, restore +1d12 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> multiplied by your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to yourself and all allies within [1] of you.
Targeted Composure

Upon making a successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an enemy, restore +1d12 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> multiplied by your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to all allies within [1] of them, including yourself.
Defensive Duellist

When attacked, add your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> as a free <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>. Then, you may use your Reaction to make an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against your aggressor. In addition, you gain an additional Reaction.
Defensive Duellist
When attacked, add your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
Defensive Riposte
After avoiding an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, make one of your own against your aggressor.
Duellist's Instinct

While dual-wielding, gain the ability to make an off-hand attack as a Bonus Action, and Opportunity Attacks that you make will attack with both weapons.

In addition, you gain three Duellist Charges. These charges can be spent to gain Advantage on Attack Rolls, or to force enemies to attack you with Disadvantage. Once per turn, landing a killing blow or Critical Hit on an enemy will restore one charge.

Furthermore, at any time you may add your global Strength Modifier to weapon damage dealt while dual-wielding at the expense of making your weapon based Attack Rolls with Disadvantage. This may be toggled at any time.
Duellist's Instinct

Gain Advantage on Attack Rolls, and force enemies to attack you with Disadvantage.

Once per turn, the first time you deal or take damage will consume one Duellist Charge. You may restore one Duellist Charge per turn by landing a killing blow or Critical Hit on an enemy.
Duellist's Assault

Add your global <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Strength Modifier</LSTag> to weapon damage dealt while dual-wielding at the expense of making your weapon based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>. This may be toggled at any time.
Dunesis

Spells you cast and Conditions you apply have their <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag> increased by 1 and will not damage your allies when targeting an area. You may further increase this number by consuming <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="Dunesis">Dunesis Charges</LSTag>. Upon casting a Spell, you generate one additional Dunesis Charge, up to a maximum of three.
Dunesis Charge

The amount of charges you may consume in order to increase the <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag> of the next Spell you cast or Condition that you apply. Upon casting a Spell, you generate one additional Dunesis Charge, up to a maximum of three.
Dunesis

Consume <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="Dunesis">Dunesis Charges</LSTag> in order to increase the <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag> of Spell you cast or Condition that you apply.
Lesser Dunesis Charge

Consume one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="Dunesis">Dunesis Charge</LSTag> in order to increase the <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag> of Spells and Conditions by one until the end of your turn.
Lesser Dunesis Charge
Affected creature has increased the <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag> of the next Spell they cast or Condition that they apply by one.
Moderate Dunesis Charge

Consume two <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="Dunesis">Dunesis Charges</LSTag> in order to increase the <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag> of Spells and Conditions by two until the end of your turn.
Moderate Dunesis Charge
Affected creature has increased the <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag> of the next Spell they cast or Condition that they apply by two.
Greater Dunesis Charge

Consume three <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="Dunesis">Dunesis Charges</LSTag> in order to increase the <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag> of Spells and Conditions by three until the end of your turn.
Greater Dunesis Charge
Affected creature has increased the <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag> of the next Spell they cast or Condition that they apply by three.
Durable

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all forms of physical damage. Additionally, upon taking a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>, your <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> are fully recovered.
Elemental Adept

When dealing damage, you ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunities</LSTag> to two elemental damage types of your choice. When you deal damage of your chosen types to an enemy, you deal an additional +1d4 damage of that same type.
Elemental Adept: Acid

When dealing damage, you ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunities</LSTag> to Acid damage. In addition, when you deal Acid damage to an enemy, you deal an additional +1d4 damage.
Elemental Adept: Cold

When dealing damage, you ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunities</LSTag> to Cold damage. In addition, when you deal Cold damage to an enemy, you deal an additional +1d4 damage.
Elemental Adept: Fire

When dealing damage, you ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunities</LSTag> to Fire damage. In addition, when you deal Fire damage to an enemy, you deal an additional +1d4 damage.
Elemental Adept: Force

When dealing damage, you ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunities</LSTag> to Force damage. In addition, when you deal Force damage to an enemy, you deal an additional +1d4 damage.
Elemental Adept: Lightning

When dealing damage, you ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunities</LSTag> to Lightning damage. In addition, when you deal Lightning damage to an enemy, you deal an additional +1d4 damage.
Elemental Adept: Necrotic

When dealing damage, you ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunities</LSTag> to Necrotic damage. In addition, when you deal Necrotic damage to an enemy, you deal an additional +1d4 damage.
Elemental Adept: Poison

When dealing damage, you ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunities</LSTag> to Poison damage. In addition, when you deal Poison damage to an enemy, you deal an additional +1d4 damage.
Elemental Adept: Psychic

When dealing damage, you ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunities</LSTag> to Psychic damage. In addition, when you deal Psychic damage to an enemy, you deal an additional +1d4 damage.
Elemental Adept: Radiant

When dealing damage, you ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunities</LSTag> to Radiant damage. In addition, when you deal Radiant damage to an enemy, you deal an additional +1d4 damage.
Elemental Adept: Thunder

When dealing damage, you ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunities</LSTag> to Thunder damage. In addition, when you deal Thunder damage to an enemy, you deal an additional +1d4 damage.
Greater Impact
Once per turn, when you land a killing blow with a weapon-based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, you can make another as a free action.
Greater Impact: Bonus Attack
Affected creature may make another attack as a free action.
Greater Impact: Bonus Attack
Make another attack as a free action.
Greater Impact: Bonus Attack (Ranged)
Fire another attack as a free action.
Intrinsic Bulwark

While wearing Medium or Heavy Armour, your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Constitution Modifier</LSTag> also reduces elemental damage. In addition, you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all forms of elemental damage.
Lucky

Any time that you roll a 7 or less on an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>, or <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Check</LSTag>, the result is immediately rerolled.
Mage Slayer

When a caster casts a Spell or Cantrip, you can use your Reaction to make an Attack Roll against them.

Enemies you hit immediately lose Concentration on any Spells they were maintaining and become Muted for one turn.
Mage Slayer
When a caster casts a Spell or <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag>, make an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against them.
Martial Adept

When making a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag>, Unarmed Attack, or <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag>, reduce the number needed to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> by 2.
Masonry of Chaos

You have a chance to experience a positive surge of <LSTag Tooltip="WildMagic">Wild Magic</LSTag> at the beginning and end of combat encounters, at the beginning of each of your turns, and when dealing or taking damage.
Melee Expertise

Melee based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> you make with your main-hand add your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> multiplied by two when rolling for damage.
Performer

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="MusicalInstrumentProficiency">Musical Instrument Proficiency</LSTag>, as well as the ability to enter into a state of performative prescence in order to buff your party, granting them a +1d4 bonus on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Performative Prescence
Through a unique performance, establish a state of prescence in order to buff your party.

Affected creature has a +1d4 bonus on all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> due to a performative presence.
Resilient

Add your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to any <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> that you make. When healed, you always heal for the maximum amount possible.
Restricted Territory

Gain the ability to use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> to make a melee based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an enemy who enters your weapons range. Additionally, landing an <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attack</LSTag> will deal the maximum damage possible.
Restricted Territory
Make a melee based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an enemy who enters your range.
Savage Assault
Roll all of your damage dice with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. Upon damaging an enemy, apply one stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WEAKENED_ARMOR">Shredded Armour</LSTag>.
Sentinel

When an enemy makes an Attack Roll against an ally, you can use your Reaction in order to make a Attack Roll of your own against that enemy.

You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks, and when you hit a creature with a melee based Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn. In addition, you gain an additional Reaction.
Sentinel
When an enemy makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an ally, make a Attack Roll against that enemy.
Restricted Movement
Affected creature cannot move.
Sharpshooter

Your <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attacks</LSTag> do not receive penalties from <LSTag Tooltip="HighGroundRules">High Ground Rules</LSTag>, and your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> is added twice when rolling for damage.
Shieldbearer

Gain Advantage on Dexterity based Saving Throws while wielding a shield. In addition, you gain three Shieldbearer Charges which can be used to negate an instance of incoming damage. Once per turn, landing a killing blow or Critical Hit on an enemy will restore one Shieldbearer Charge.

Furthermore, performing a Shield Bash allows you to reflect all projectiles until the start of your next turn.
Shieldbearer Charge
The amount of times you may utilize your Shield negate all incoming damage.
Armoured Fortress
Negate all incoming damage.
Shieldbearer
Affected creature will reflect all projectiles fired at them.
Spellbreak
When casting a Spell or <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag>, reduce the number needed to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> by 2.
Tavern Brawler

When making an unarmed attack or Throw, your Strength Modifier is added to all damage rolls. Additionally, your Dexterity Modifier is added to all Attack Rolls.

Melee weapons you equip in your Main-Hand gain the Thrown property. When thrown, they will return back to you.
Tavern Brawler
Cause your Main-Hand melee weapon to gain the <LSTag Tooltip="Thrown">Thrown</LSTag> property. When thrown, it will return to you.
Tavern Brawler
Affected weapon has gained the <LSTag Tooltip="Thrown">Thrown</LSTag> property. When thrown, it will return to who threw it.
Tough
Increase the amount of <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> you gain per level from 6 to 12. Additionally, any damage dealt to you that totals 2 or less is nullified.
War Caster

Gain Advantage on Concentration based Saving Throws. Additionally, you can cast Shocking Grasp against an enemy who enters into melee range as a free Reaction, as well as Bind your weapons.

Furthermore, you may cast any ranged Spell or Cantrip as a melee Spell. This may be toggled at any time.
War Caster
Cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ShockingGrasp">Shocking Grasp</LSTag> on a target moving into melee range as a free reaction.
War Caster
Affected creature may cast any ranged Spell or <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag> as a melee Spell.
War Caster: Bind Weapon

Your melee or ranged weapons become magical, utilizing your Spellcasting Ability for Attack Rolls and damage.

Once per turn, upon killing another creature or landing a Critical Hit with your Bound Weapon, you restore a level one Spell Slot.
War Caster: Bind Weapon (Melee)

Your melee weapons become magical, utilizing your Spellcasting Ability for Attack Rolls and damage.

Once per turn, upon killing another creature or landing a Critical Hit with your Bound Weapon, you restore a level one Spell Slot.
War Caster: Bind Weapon (Ranged)

Your ranged weapons become magical, utilizing your Spellcasting Ability for Attack Rolls and damage.

Once per turn, upon killing another creature or landing a Critical Hit with your Bound Weapon, you restore a level one Spell Slot.
War Caster

Affected weapon has become magical, utilizing its owners Spellcasting Ability for Attack Rolls and damage.

Once per turn, upon killing another creature or landing a Critical Hit with your Bound Weapon, you restore a level one Spell Slot.
Alchemist

Healing potions you consume always restore the maximum amount of <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> possible. Additionally, thrown grenades will trigger an additional explosion, dealing damage to all creatures nearby your original target. Furthermore, upon applying a coating to your weapon, it will persist until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Anchored Focus

For the first three turns of any combat encounter, you are unable to lose your <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag> on Spells you have cast. Kills and <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> will reset the duration of your focus if active.
Anchored Focus
Affected creature is unable to lose their <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag>.
Arcane Echoes
Once per turn, you recover a level one <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
Blessings of the Moon

Gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CShout_MOO_Nightsong_RadiantConsumption">Blessing of Moonfire</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MOO_Nightsong_GuidingBolt">Lunar Flare</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MOO_Nightsong_SearingSmite">Lunar Strike</LSTag>. In addition, dealing damage to an enemy restores 1d4 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> to all nearby allies.
Combat Medic

Upon <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Help">Helping</LSTag> another creature, they regain additional <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> equal to the amount you currently have. In addition, you may Help creatures as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>. This may be toggled at any time.
Galvanized Stormsoul

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to both Lightning and Thunder damage. Upon dealing or taking damage, you receive one stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>.
Multifaceted
Select a character trait, a personality type, and four additional <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skills</LSTag> to become <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in.
Psionic Overcharge

When dealing damage, you deal an additional 1d4 Psychic damage and inflict one stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_PSYCHIC_MENTAL_FATIGUE">Mental Fatigue</LSTag>. In addition, Illithid Powers no longer reduce your maximum <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>.
Reactive Assault

Upon landing a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, you may expend your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to make a basic weapon-based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Reactive Assault
Affected creature may use their <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to make a basic weapon-based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Reactive Assault: Bonus Attack
Make another attack using your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>.
Reactive Assault: Bonus Attack (Ranged)
Fire another attack using your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>.
Together In Torment

Dealing damage to an enemy with an Attack Roll will Torment them for three turns and grant you one stack of Tormentor. Upon damaging a Tormented enemy with an Attack Roll, all nearby Tormented enemies will take Necrotic damage equal to the amount of stacks of Tormentor that you have.

Landing a killing blow will reset your stacks of Tormentor.
Tormented

Affected creature will take additional damage when their <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TORMENTOR">Tormentor</LSTag> deals Necrotic damage to a Tormented creature through an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>. This damage is equal to the amount of Tormentor stacks that they have.
Tormentor

Affected creature will deal additional Necrotic damage to all <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TORMENTED">Tormented</LSTag> enemies within [1] of them equal to the amount of Tormentor stacks that they have when dealing damage to a Tormented enemy through an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Visage of Reflection
Upon receiving physical damage, your aggressor takes half of the damage you received as Force damage.
One level in required base class

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit.

Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: Arcanist

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a Arcanist Artificer.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: Artillerist

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a Artillerist Artificer.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: Battle Synthetic

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a Battle Synthetic Artificer.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: Infused Arcsmith

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a Infused Arcsmith Artificer.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: Beastheart

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a Beastheart Barbarian.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: Berserker

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a Berserker Barbarian.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: Frostbreaker

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a Frostbreaker Barbarian.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: Giant's Blood

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a Giant's Blood Barbarian.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: Wild Soul

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a Wild Soul Barbarian.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: College of Captivation

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a College of Captivation Bard.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: College of Lore

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a College of Lore Bard.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: College of Steel

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a College of Steel Bard.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: College of Valour

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a College of Valour Bard.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: Death Domain

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a Death Domain Cleric.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: Life Domain

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a Life Domain Cleric.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: Tempest Domain

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a Tempest Domain Cleric.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
Yokebreaker: War Domain

Gain the unlocks associated with levels 1 through 3 of a War Domain Cleric.

Selecting a subclass you already have levels in will typically provide no benefit. Spells gained via Yokebreaker cannot be upcast.
